body: Main Menu      Button Function     A Choose   B Cancel   Control Pad Move cursor    In Game      Button Function     A, B Shot   L, R Laser   Select Back to Main Menu   Control Pad Move

body:
How to build Requirements  devkitPro r18 (buildscripts 20060412)  You need to use version r18. Do not use the latest release!    Steps Execute the following commands in Terminal.
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/pqrs-org/Vulkanon.git cd Vulkanon/vulkanon make

title: Development

body:
Defeat the boss within three minutes time limits.
  Laser Laser destroys all enemy bullets. You can use Laser when Power is 100%.
  Enemy Bullets Suicide Bullets and Aimed Suicide Bullets are generated when you shot Destroyable Bullet.
   Image Type         Destroyable Bullet       Suicide Bullet       Aimed Suicide Bullet
